body_html:
Hi @tibuch
I compiled tensorflow from source using bazel. I didn't try using a docker yet.
Here is my system configuration, just in case:
CentOs
tensorflow: 1.7
keras: 2.0.9
cuda: 9.1
cudnn: 7.1
nvidia driver: 390.48

EDIT1: I ran the same code with tf 1.10 compiled from source this time and the artifact doesn't appear
EDIT2: Artifact still appears for different volume input shapes

Here is my system configuration, just in case:
